gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 114, Warriors 109
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Warriors, 114-109. CJ McCollum recorded 28 points (8-13 3PM), five rebounds, and five assists for the Pelicans, Zion Williamson (26 points, career-high six steals) and Trey Murphy (24 points, six 3PM) combined for 50 points in the victory. Stephen Curry tallied 33 points (16 in the 4th quarter), seven 3PM, and five assists for the Warriors in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 49-32, while the Warriors fall to 45-36.
